content: Great work as always and great write up on Happ, you nailed him perfectly. Second in the Big Ten in steals per game and third in rebounds per game is a combination you don’t see often.By the way, I’m a Badger fan and I fully concede Swanigan is the best player in the Big Ten this year and deserves POY over Happ. I’ll settle for top 10 in the country.
